review: Took a little bit to figure this out but I love putting something on my phone and it going to the tv.
author: Jessica Hensley

review: This goes really well with the protector I have. Anxious for more apps to become 'castable', like nbc.com, cbs.com, etc. Still has a few bugs, but a quick reboot of the Chromecast clears up the problem.
author: T Crow "Tlc"

review: Hooked it up last week and it works perfectly.  Very pleased with the purchase.
author: Barbara A. Freudemann

review: Best quality streaming ever. Way better than my Roku.
author: Jameson

review: Works great, it's very simple and easy to use, doesn't offer much besides casting a small amount of apps.
author: Charles

review: I have 4 and love it.  My kids use them all the time.  At first there were not tons of apps that supported chrome cast but now with screen cast and lots more apps it has come of age.
author: One armed viking

review: this is used everyday! love this little device!
author: dawn colbert
